Description of incident: Craftsman Book Company notified customers of a breach that occured on their site. On Tuesday May 27th the company discovered unauthorized access to their site and recommended a change in their username and password. Since that time they discovered that the breach also included charges on customers credit card. The hackers found another site operated by the company and through the security vulnerabilities in the one site, they were able to get to the Craftsman Book site and ultimately to the customers information.Since the vulnerability was discovered, the company has shut down the other site and is in the process of securing it.
